betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§oGood luck fueling this§r

The §aLarge Tungstensteel Boiler§r is the final steam boiler. It's even more efficient than the previous ones, and produces more steam too.

This thing is §nextremely§r not worth it, and you should use something else. Don't make this, it's not good. Steam doesn't scale beyond this point, and this boiler will likely be removed in the future.

§eNote§r: This quest can be skipped (for completion progress) by clicking the Checkmark. You do not have to actually craft one.

§bLore§r: No one makes these in GT5u either...
